T02D2282:137b-3: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2282:137b-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2282:137b-5: chu zad pas ni 'dam gyi padma skams //
T02D2282:137b-6: sbrang rtsi bros pas gar song cha yang med //
T02D2282:137b-7: rtsa ba lo ma sdong po me yi sbyor bas zad //
T02D2282:137b-8: nag po na re dbang po'i bzhad gad la ni ltos //
T02D2282:137b-9: za zhing 'thung dang gnas nas yal ga bcag nas song //
T02D2282:137b-10: kye ho 'di ni bdag gi las ni gtum mo lta bu yin //
T02D2282:138a-2: yon tan brgya ni skyon gcig gis ni zad par byas //
T02D2282:138a-3: rgya mtsho zad pas padma rnams kyang skams //
T02D2282:138a-4: de tshe sgo bcu las ni du ba byung //
T02D2282:138a-5: 'jig rten pa ni nag po med ces zer //
T02D2282:138a-6: nag po theg chen zab mo'i nags na gnas //
T02D2282:138a-7: sems ni stong zhing gnyug ma'i ngang du rdzogs //
T02D2282:138a-8: phung po bzhad gad gyur kyang 'gyod pa med //
T02D2282:138a-9: 'o ma'i nang na mar yod pa ni mi mthong bzhin //
T02D2282:138a-10: 'dod pa yod de 'jig rten pas ni ma mthong ngo //
T02D2282:138a-11: 'jig rten 'tsho ba 'am ni 'chi ba gang yang med //
T02D2282:138a-12: 'di lta'i longs spyod nag po rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2282:138a-13: padma bzhin du lus cha skams gyur kyang //
T02D2282:138a-14: nag po ci yi phyir na shi zhes bya //
T02D2282:138a-15: brtul zhugs spyod pa'i slob dpon chen po nag pos
T02D2282:138a-16: mdzad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so
